<!-- BEGIN_AUTOGENERATED -->
# Gvasgn Node Formatting

Represents global variable assignment (i.e. `$foo = 42`)
<!-- END_AUTOGENERATED -->

## Formats

Before:

```ruby
$name = "toby"
```

After:

```ruby
$name = "toby"
```

## Formats with operator assignment

Before:

```ruby
$name += "toby"
```

After:

```ruby
$name += "toby"
```
